data.title: 101 dalmatians II. Patch's London adventure
data.meta_description: The adventure begins when Pongo and Perdita's pup, Patch, who is not satisfied being just one out of 101, gets the chance to meet his TV hero, Thunderbolt, the 'One-of-a-kind Wonderdog.' When Thunderbolt's trusty sidekick Lightning reveals that the show's producers are on the lookout for a new star, Thunderbolt - with Patch in tow - struts out into the real world to perform true acts of heroism. When the puppy-obsessed Cruella De Vil returns, it's Patch and Thunderbolt's teamwork and friendship that will save the day.
data.text: Randolph Township Library - Juvenile MediaCHILDREN'S ENTERTAINMENTA DVD was returned by a different patron. It is by the phone in the office. Does it belong to this item? MEA
